2028500.name: Symmetrik Soundtrack
2028500.description:
This is the official soundtrack to Symmetrik!

Take on the role of an employee of the M.A.G.I.C Corporation!

Your job is to keep the multiverse under control! To accomplish this, you must enter the mirror-dimension and identify what is not SYMMETRIK, and then put everything in order! Only symmetry, can keep the power of the multiverse under control. Don't let anything go unnoticed!

Look for missing objects in mirrored environments. Everything must be returned to its rightful place!

A “hidden object” game like no other, putting you inside every scene!

Travel through space and time, search through a medieval tavern or a futuristic laboratory, find the missing objects scattered in environments that tell their own story.

At the end of each job you will receive a grade, try to be the fastest and most efficient employee and beat your friends on the leaderboards! Become the employee of the month!

Customize and evolve your character, get access to new spells that will help you find all the lost objects.

Play against your friends in online PvP matches.

In addition to over 20 official dimensions, create and play shared dimensions in the Steam Workshop.

SYMMETRIK also features Twitch-specific functions! Help or hinder your favorite streamer when they are playing with commands directly in chat!
